com.sylconnexity.spring18.controller

Class DBClickController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sylconnexity.spring18.controller.DBClickController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(path="/clicks")
public class DBClickController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the Click class, the API of which is available at /clicks.

    • Method Detail

      • getClicks

        @Cacheable(value="Clicks")
 @GetMapping(path="")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.Iterable<Click> getClicks(@RequestParam(value="linkID",defaultValue="-1")
                                                                                                              java.lang.Long linkID)
        Get all Clicks or Clicks with a given link ID.
        Parameters:
        linkID - The ID of an associated link
        Returns:
        A list of Clicks, with the given link ID if provided

      • getClickByID

        @Cacheable(value="Click")
 @GetMapping(path="/{id}")
 @ResponseBody
public Click getClickByID(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                 java.lang.Long clickID)
        Get the Click with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        clickID - The ID of a click
        Returns:
        The click with the given ID or null if it does not exist

      • saveClick

        @CacheEvict(cacheNames={"Click","Clicks"},
            allEntries=true)
 @PostMapping(path="")
 @ResponseBody
public Click saveClick(@RequestParam(value="linkID")
                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Long linkID,
                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="orderAmount")
                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Double orderAmount,
                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="orderNumber")
                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String orderNumber,
                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="unitsOrdered")
                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Long unitsOrdered,
                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="convertedToSale")
                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Boolean convertedToSale,
                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="redirectDate")
                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String redirectDate,
                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="ipAddress")
                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String ipAddress,
                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="dma")
                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String dma)
        Creates a new click with the provided information.
        Parameters:
        linkID - Identifier for the associated link of the click
        orderAmount - If the click converted to a sale this field will hold the total order amount in dollars
        orderNumber - If the click converted to a sale this field will hold the total number of items purchased with that order
        unitsOrdered - If the click converted to a sale this field will hold the total number of items purchased with that order
        convertedToSale - True if click converted to a sale and False otherwise
        redirectDate - The date at which a click happened
        ipAddress - The IP address of the user who clicked on a link
        dma - The designated market area
        Returns:
        The newly created click

      • deleteClick

        @CacheEvict(cacheNames={"Click","Clicks"},
            allEntries=true)
 @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}")
 @ResponseBody
public void deleteClick(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Long clickID)
        Deletes the Click with the given ID if it exists.
        Parameters:
        clickID - An ID of a Click
